title: The Panama Papers exposed a huge global problem. What's next?
description: On April 3, 2016 we saw the largest data leak in history. The Panama Papers exposed rich and powerful people hiding vast amounts of money in offshore accounts. But what does it all mean? We called Robert Palmer of Global Witness to find out.
author: Robert Palmer
keywords: TED, talks, activism, business, economics, global issues, corruption, government, identity, big problems, inequality, investment, law, news, poverty, money
